trans-unit.source: Provides the abstract base class for implementing a custom type resolver.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe base abstrata para implementar um resolvedor de tipo personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The JavaScriptTypeResolver class provides the services for: - Converting managed type information to a string value through the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveTypeId%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A classe JavaScriptTypeResolver fornece os serviços para:-Convertendo digite informações para um valor de cadeia de caracteres por meio de <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveTypeId%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveTypeId%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Resolving a string value back to the appropriate managed type through the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Resolver um valor de cadeia de caracteres ao apropriado gerenciados tipo por meio de <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveType%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> object serializes custom types, it can optionally include in the serialized JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string a value that contains type information.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>objeto serializa tipos personalizados, ele pode opcionalmente incluir na cadeia de caracteres serializada notação JSON (JavaScript Object) um valor que contém informações de tipo.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> can then reference this string value to determine the appropriate managed type to which the JSON string will be converted.
trans-unit.target: Durante a desserialização, <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>pode, então, referência gerenciada esse valor de cadeia de caracteres para determinar o tipo que a cadeia de caracteres JSON será convertida.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>

trans-unit.source: If you provide a type resolver to the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance, the serializer will use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveTypeId%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveType%2A> methods to map between the managed type and the string value during the serialization and deserialization process, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se você fornecer um resolvedor de tipo para o <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>instância, o serializador usará o <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveTypeId%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveType%2A>métodos para mapear entre o tipo gerenciado e o valor de cadeia de caracteres durante o processo de serialização e desserialização, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveType%2A> </xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver.ResolveTypeId%2A> </xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The JavaScriptTypeResolver class is the base class for the <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.SimpleTypeResolver> class, which provides an implementation of a type resolver that uses the managed type assembly-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: A classe JavaScriptTypeResolver é a classe base para o <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.SimpleTypeResolver>classe, que fornece uma implementação de um resolvedor de tipo que usa o nome qualificado do assembly do tipo gerenciado.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.SimpleTypeResolver>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref:System.Type> object that is associated with the specified type name.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna o <xref:System.Type>objeto que está associado com o nome do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When a type resolver is associated with a <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> instance, the serializer uses the ResolveType method when it iterates through a JSON string to determine the specific managed type to which the JSON type should be converted.
trans-unit.target: Quando um resolvedor de tipo está associado com um <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>instância, o serializador usa o método ResolveType quando ele itera por meio de uma cadeia de caracteres JSON determinar o específicos gerenciados tipo ao qual o tipo JSON deve ser convertido.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The name of the managed type.
The <xref:System.Type> object that is associated with the specified type name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>objeto que está associado com o nome do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the type name for the specified <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna o nome do tipo especificado <xref:System.Type>objeto.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If the ResolveTypeId method returns either `null` or <xref:System.String>, then the type resolver does not support the type.
trans-unit.target: Se o método ResolveTypeId retorna um `null` ou <xref:System.String>, em seguida, o resolvedor de tipo não oferece suporte ao tipo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The managed type to be resolved.
trans-unit.target: O tipo gerenciado a ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The name of the specified managed type.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo gerenciado especificado.
